name: Buttertoast
description:
* If the UI is slightly cut - ZOOM OUT until it looks good :D

The game starts slow, but gets more interesting fast! Don't skip after only the first part! :)

Controls: 

WASD \\ ARROWS - Movement 

SPACE - Laser \ Rage 

Z, X  -In the beginning to pass the butter. 

This is my submission to the 2021 Brackeys game jam. 

I created all the models and code myself, however I did use some assets, such as:

* Brackeys health bar UI from: "How to make a HEALTH BAR in Unity!" on YouTube.

* PolygonParticleFX.

* Ultimate Game Music Collection.

* VolumetricLights.  

* "Doom Music | Metal Instrumental No Copyright | For Videos" on youtube.
